page.title: 19 A Country Doctor's Day
page.content: On call Tuesday night - quiet. {8.30am}Arrive surgery. Letters and telephone calls.{9.00am}morning surgery-busy but varied with emergencies.{11.30am}finished!Repeat prescriptions and complicated phone call.{11.45am}Visits well spread: Gosfield,Earls Colne and Wickham St. Pauls.{12.20pm}Emergency in Greenstead Green.Lady with head injury.What a mess! Wound dressed and off to hospital.{14.00hrs.}Ante-natal clinic Best of the week! All happy and healthy.{15.30hrs.}Visit patients in Halstead hospital. No change! {16.00hrs.}Evening surgery - Hectic! {18.30hrs.}Last visit. New patient - pregnant with backache.Gosh!In labour Admit to hospital.Follow ambulance which stops.Light flashing! Baby boy born.All well!{20.15hrs.}Home. I am hungry!
